util

Class RDFBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.RDFBase
      • util.RDFBuilder

  • public class RDFBuilder
extends RDFBase
    Deals with storing Java objects into an RDF triple store.
    Author:
    Florin-Cristian Gavrila, Tudor Sirbu, Claudiu Tarta

      • addInContactWith

        public void addInContactWith(twitter4j.User firstUser,
                    twitter4j.User secondUser)
        Creates the connection between two separate users which have been in contact on Twitter. Typically, the two users will be different.
        Parameters:
        firstUser - one of the users, type User.
        secondUser - the other user, type User.

      • addVisitsForUser

        public void addVisitsForUser(twitter4j.User user,
                    java.util.List<fi.foyt.foursquare.api.entities.CompleteVenue> venues)
        Adds a list of visits to a user in the triple store.
        Parameters:
        user - The user for which to add the venues
        venues - The list of venues to add
